wg:ranking.wg:description: Ranking according to edge attribute, changes edge color.
wg:ranking.wg:name: Edge color ranking

wg:property.wg:name: Edge attribute
wg:property.wg:description: Id of attribute which will be used for ranking. It has to be one of already calculated edge attributes (see GEXF format)

wg:property.wg:name: Start color
wg:property.wg:description: Color of node with lowest value. In hexadecimal format: RRGGBB, e.g. FEF0D9

wg:property.wg:name: End color
wg:property.wg:description: Color of node with highest value. In hexadecimal format: RRGGBB, e.g. B30000
